participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, with a deep appreciation for arts and personal connections.
participant_1.background: I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park. I work in a publishing building. I felt like I was going to have a heart attack when my coworker yelled at me in front of the whole office. I've studied ballet all my life. I love my mother because she's always been there for me.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and hands-on, with a passion for creativity and shared experiences.
participant_2.background: My favorite people are my friends who I can drink coffee with and talk about anything. I love a big bowl of chili after a long day of riding my bike. I love working with my hands and getting to see the creative process through to completion. I love cooking. I have no need for a fortune teller; I know my future is bright.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite thing to do?
I love working with my hands and seeing the creative process through to completion.
That's really cool! What do you like to work with?
Those are both great hobbies! I've always wanted to learn how to cook.
It's a great skill to have! You can make some really delicious meals.
I'm sure! I've always loved going out to eat, but I think it'd be really fun to be able to make my own meals.
It's definitely more rewarding! And it's a great way to save money.
That's true! I'm sure I'll be able to find some great recipes online.
There are so many great resources out there. You'll be cooking like a pro in no time!
Thanks for the encouragement! I'm excited to give it a try.
You're welcome! I'm sure you'll do great.
